ygData.subject: RE: Sonorus clouding and Undead
ygData.msgSnippet: While you are in lower guk (the ruins of old guk) or SolB (Nagafen s Lair) you may as well unmemorize your invis song and use it for something else. Same goes
ygData.messageBody:
While you are in lower guk (the ruins of old guk) or SolB (Nagafen's Lair)
you may as well unmemorize your invis song and use it for something else.
Same goes for Selo's Accelerando.

I find myself faced with new and interesting choices in these underground
dungeons where Selo's does not work, since I have always used a memorization
slot for it since the day I got it...now its funny to drop that song and
come up with something else useful to replace it while in these places.

Faras Tar'Linedhel
Half-Elf Bard of the 35th song
E'ci
______________________________
"We are what we pretend to be,
so we must be careful about
what we pretend to be."
- Kurt Vonnegut


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Christopher Andrews [mailto:cmandy_drew@...]
> Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 3:26 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Sonorus clouding and Undead
>
>
> From: "Christopher Andrews" <cmandy_drew@...>
>
> I was in Lower Guk just last night... at least I thought
> it was. It was
> my first time down there. As I finished zoning, it said 'You
> have entered
> old ruins of guk. (is that lower guk?)
> I zoned in as a higher level dude was slaying a shin ghoul
> knight; the
> very mob (one of) from which I need to loot a lambent quest
> item. I had my
> invis song going as per usual. All through upper I noticed
> that everything
> was indifferent to me. YAY! Ok, song is working like a charm.
> I did manage
> to con the shin ghoul knight while he was being attacked. "A
> Shin Ghoul
> Knight scowls at you, ready to attack. What would you like
> your tombstone to
> say?" Um ok, first reaction is to zone, especially since he
> was just inches
> away from me. The guy was using the zone line as a buffer,
> apparently. NP.
> Zoned... Went LD... That's where I am as it stands.
> So, at 19 so far, from what I think is lower (?), can see
> through invis.
> Now, whether or not your invis ability increases as you level
> or not, is
> something i know zero about.
> All I know is I was happy to get invis so I can get down
> to lower guk to
> get these items (shin greaves and gauntlets) before i had a
> chance to either
> go hunt there for exp, or get some faction hits somewhere else.
>
> Pava, Bard of the 19th measure
> Silent Dragons
> Cazic Thule
>
> >Hmmm, I will have to give this a try in Lower Guk. I really
> need to learn
> >that place better.
>
